scripts.start: tsc && concurrently "tsc -w"  "nodemon --exec npm run run-dev --watch src -e html,ts"
scripts.run-dev: npm run copy-views && npm run copy-public && node build/app.js
scripts.copy-views: if [ -d build/views ]; then rm -r build/views && cp -r src/views build/views; else cp -r src/views build/views; fi
scripts.copy-public: if [ -d build/public ]; then rm -r build/public && cp -r src/public build/public; else cp -r src/public build/public; fi
